ext_description.note: The text description for this Application Object has not been fully updated to agree with the EXPRESS.
ext_description.p: A Pre_defined_parallel_datum_axis_symbol_3d_2d_relationship is a type of . A Pre_defined_parallel_datum_axis_symbol_3d_2d_relationship establishes the geometric reference relationship between a representation in a 3 dimensional coordinate system and the related representation in a 2 dimensional coordinate system where the is parallel to the plane that represents the 2 dimensional coordinate system in the 3 dimensional coordinate system.
ext_description.note: Only the line representing the central axis is expected to be mathematically derived. Due to differences in 2 dimensional CAD systems the start and end treatments (arrowheads) may not be mathematically derived.
The text description for this Application Object has not been fully updated to agree with the EXPRESS.
ext_description.p: A Pre_defined_perpendicular_datum_axis_symbol_3d_2d_relationship is a type of . A Pre_defined_perpendicular_datum_axis_symbol_3d_2d_relationship establishes the geometric reference relationship between a representation in a 3 dimensional coordinate system and the related representation in a 2 dimensional coordinate system where the is perpendicular to the plane that represents the 2 dimensional coordinate system in the 3 dimensional coordinate system. The controlled information is the centre of the circle.
ext_description.note: Only the center of the circle representing the central axis is expected to be directly referenced. Due to differences in CAD systems resolutions the lines used as crosshairs may sightly deviate from intersecting at the center of the circle.
The text description for this Application Object has not been fully updated to agree with the EXPRESS.
ext_description.p: A Pre_defined_perpendicular_datum_plane_symbol_3d_2d_relationship is a type of . A Pre_defined_perpendicular_datum_plane_symbol_3d_2d_relationship establishes the geometric reference relationship between a representation in a 3 dimensional coordinate system and the related representation in a 2 dimensional coordinate system where the is perpendicular to the plane that represents the 2 dimensional coordinate system in the 3 dimensional coordinate system. The controlled information is the line representing the normal of the plane.
ext_description.note: Due to differences in CAD systems resolutions the lines used as base and arrowhead may sightly deviate from intersecting at the start and end of the line.
